mutants.code:
def reverse_string(s):
    chars = list(s)
    length = len(s)
    for i in range(length / 2):
        (chars[i], chars[length - i - 1]) = (chars[length - i - 1], chars[i])
    reversed_string = ''.join(chars)
    return reversed_string
